original_title: Sajith and Ranil should unite: Vadivel
original_body_lines: MP Vadivel Suresh said President Ranil Wickremesinghe and Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa should unite while setting aside their differences, to develop the country.
“Considering the issues the country is faced with, it is best if Sajith and Ranil can unite. Two years after, we can continue with party politics,” he said.
The MP added that he has no hopes of getting a ministerial portfolio.
